name: SYST3M H4CK3R 2OOO
description:
This game was created for the Ludum Dare 49,

You play as a hacker who has just managed to get access to the CEO of Ludum.Inc's computer. Your role is to bypass the computer's strong security, overload the servers capacity and destroy the data. But beware, you only have little time before your presence is spotted. Will you manage to complete your mission before the computer crashes ?

Credits : 

Silouane Parent - Game Designer/Music Composer

Victoria Routier- Game Designer

Grégoire Vottero - Game Designer

Samuel Marrache - Game Designer

Maxence Dupin - Game Programmer
